程序包 com.view.XListView

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    ILoadingLayout  
    IPullToRefresh<T extends View>  
    PullToRefreshBase.OnLastItemVisibleListener
    Simple Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has scrolled to the end of the AdapterView.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener<V extends View>
    Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has started or finished a touch event.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener<V extends View>
    Simple Listener to listen for any callbacks to Refresh.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener2<V extends View>
    An advanced version of the Listener to listen for callbacks to Refresh.
    PullToRefreshScrollView.ScrollViewListener  
    XListView.IXListViewListener
    implements this interface to get refresh/load more event.
    XListView.OnXScrollListener
    you can listen ListView.OnScrollListener or this one. it will invoke onXScrolling when header/footer scroll back.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    LoadingLayoutProxy  
    OverscrollHelper  
    PullToRefreshAdapterViewBase<T extends AbsListView>  
    PullToRefreshBase<T extends View>  
    PullToRefreshGridView  
    PullToRefreshListView  
    PullToRefreshScrollView  
    PullToRefreshWebView  
    XListView  
    XListViewFooter  
    XListViewHeader  
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明

    PullToRefreshBase.Mode  
    PullToRefreshBase.Orientation  
    PullToRefreshBase.State
